original: gaṅgā me sarvato bhūyāttvayi gaṅge 'stu me sthitiḥ /
analyzed: gaṅgā me sarvatas bhūyāt tvayi gaṅge stu me sthitiḥ

original: ādau tvamante madhye ca sarvā tvaṃ gāṅgate śive // NarP_2,43.83 //
analyzed: ādau tvam ante madhye ca sarvā tvam śive

original: gaṅge tvaṃ paramātmā ca śivastubhyaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.84 //
analyzed: gaṅge tvam paramātmā ca śivaḥ tubhyam namaḥ namaḥ

original: itīdaṃ paṭhati stotraṃ nityaṃ bhaktiparastu yaḥ /

original: idaṃ stotraṃ gṛhe yasya likhitaṃ paripūjyate /
analyzed: idam stotram gṛhe yasya likhitam paripūjyate

original: nāgnicaurabhayaṃ tatra pāpebhyo 'pi bhayaṃ nahi // NarP_2,43.88 //

original: japaṃstu daśakṛtvaśca daridro vāpi cākṣamaḥ // NarP_2,43.89 //
analyzed: japan tu daśa kṛtvas ca daridraḥ vā api ca akṣamaḥ

original: umā yathā tathā gaṅgā cātra bhedo na vidyate // NarP_2,43.92 //

original: lakṣmīgauryataraṃ yaśca prabrūte mūḍhadhīstu saḥ // NarP_2,43.93 //

original: dhanyā dehaṃ vimuñcanti hṛdayasthe janārdane // NarP_2,43.94 //

original: ye muñcanti narā-prāṇān gaṅgāyāṃ vidhinaṃ dini /

original: sā getistyajataḥ prāṇān gaṅgāyāṃ tu śarīriṇaḥ // NarP_2,43.97 //

original: satyameva paraṃ lokamāpnoti pitṛbhiḥ saha // NarP_2,43.98 //

original: atradūre samīpe ca sadṛśaṃ yojanadvayam // NarP_2,43.100 //
analyzed: atra dūre samīpe ca sadṛśam yojana dvayam

analyzed: gaṅgāyām tu mṛtaḥ martyaḥ svargam mokṣam ca vindati

original: antarikṣe kṣitau toye pāpīyānapi yo mṛtaḥ /
analyzed: antarikṣe kṣitau toye pāpīyān api yaḥ mṛtaḥ

original: tadasthipiṇḍaṃ puṭake nidhāya paśyan diśaṃ pretagaṇopagūḍhām // NarP_2,43.113 //
analyzed: tad asthi piṇḍam puṭake nidhāya paśyan diśam preta gaṇa upagūḍhām

original: namo 'stu dharmāya vadanpraviśya jalaṃ sa me prīta iti kṣipecca /

original: tatra nārāyaṇaḥ svāmī nānyaḥ svāmī kadācana // NarP_2,43.116 //
analyzed: tatra nārāyaṇaḥ svāmī na anyaḥ svāmī kadācana

original: iti keṣāṃ mataṃ devi śrutismṛtiṣu saṃmatam /
analyzed: iti keṣām matam devi śruti smṛtiṣu saṃmatam

original: tīraṃ tyaktvā vasetkṣetre tīre vāso na ceṣyate /
analyzed: tīram tyaktvā vaset kṣetre tīre vāsaḥ na ca iṣyate

original: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā palāyante yathā siṃhaṃ vanaukasaḥ // NarP_2,43.121 //
analyzed: tām tu dṛṣṭvā palāyante yathā siṃham vanaukasaḥ

original: siddhakṣetraṃ tu tajjñeyaṃ samantāttu triyojanam // NarP_2,43.122 //
analyzed: siddha kṣetram tu tat jñeyam samantāt tu tri yojanam

original: nimitteṣu ca sarveṣu tannivṛtto bhavennaraḥ // NarP_2,43.123 //
analyzed: nimitteṣu ca sarveṣu tad nivṛttaḥ bhavet naraḥ

niṣphalam tasya tat tīrtham yāvat tat dhanam ucyate

original: janārdane tu vikrīte vikrītaṃ bhuvanatrayam // NarP_2,43.125 //
analyzed: janārdane tu vikrīte vikrītam bhuvanatrayam

original: gaṅgā tīrasamudbhūtāṃ ma-daṃ mūrghnā bibharti yaḥ /
analyzed: gaṅgā tīra samudbhūtām madam mūrghnā bibharti yaḥ

original: bibharti rūpaṃ sor'kasya tamonāśāya kevalam // NarP_2,43.126 //
analyzed: bibharti rūpam sa ūrkasya tamaḥ nāśāya kevalam

original: paṭhan śṛṇvannaro hyeti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_2,43.128 //
analyzed: paṭhan śṛṇvan naraḥ hi eti tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam

original: vaiṣṇavīṃ gatimicchadbhiḥ śaivīṃ vā vidhinandini // NarP_2,43.129 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavīm gatim icchadbhiḥ śaivīm vā vidhinandini

original: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye pūjādikathaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bṛhat nāradīya purāṇa uttara bhāge mohinīvasu saṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye pūjādikatham nāma tricatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
